title: Apple Introduces Next-Generation iPad Pro With M1 Chip
content:
Apple today introduced the next-generation iPad Pro with the same M1 chip found in the latest Macs.


This story is part of our coverage of Apple's ongoing "Spring Loaded" event today. Refresh for more details and follow along with our live blog for the latest updates. We're also live tweeting the event on Twitter.
Related Roundup: iPad Pro
Tag: April 2021 event
Buyer's Guide: 11" iPad Pro (Caution), 12.9" iPad Pro (Caution)

This article, "Apple Introduces Next-Generation iPad Pro With M1 Chip" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums
author: Joe Rossignol
siteTitle: MacRumors: Mac News and Rumors - All Stories
